## Another Section

You can install > clio using the `npm i -g clio` command:

```bash
npm i -g clio
```

## Playground

```clio
export fn main argv:
  console.log "Hello world"
```

## Tabs

|> clio.toml

```toml
[build]
src = "src"
destination = "dest"
```

|> main.clio

```js
export fn main argv:
  console.log argv
```
